short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get real-time audit reports and detailed contract analysis directly in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GUARIT Extension is designed to provide users with real-time, comprehensive blockchain security insights while browsing their favorite charting websites. This powerful tool is essential for anyone involved in cryptocurrency trading, offering detailed analyses of smart contracts and tokens to help you avoid potential risks.

Why Install This Extension?

Users can paste any token address to obtain a detailed scan of the token. This feature offers comprehensive insights and security analysis, detecting potential honeypots and other risks.

The extension delivers an in-depth analysis of smart contracts, highlighting any potential vulnerabilities and offering insights into the contractâ€™s security features. This ensures that you have all the necessary information to assess the safety and reliability of the token.

When browsing on supported websites such as dexscreener, dextools, geckoterminal, and etherscan, the extension automatically provides a detailed scan of the token displayed in the chart. This includes essential information such as token metrics, liquidity status, tax models, and contract holdings.

Currently, it supports the Ethereum blockchain, providing detailed insights for Ethereum-based tokens. We are actively working to expand support to other major blockchains such as Solana (SOL), Binance Smart Chain (BSC), and Base. Stay tuned for these updates.

With this tool, you can effortlessly scan any token address and detect potential honeypots, providing protection and enhancing your browsing experience. It helps safeguard your crypto assets and investments by offering comprehensive analysis and examination of smart contracts and blockchain security.

Disclaimer: While this extension provides valuable security insights, it does not guarantee complete protection against all potential risks. Users should still exercise caution and conduct their own research when engaging in cryptocurrency activities.
